The Tracking Crisis

Why Every Website is Losing Data

In 2021, Apple changed everything. Now your analytics are wrong ‚Äî no matter what business you're in.

üì±

iOS Users Block 40% of Data

iPhone and iPad users installed Apple's privacy feature in 2021. 40% tap "Don't Allow Tracking." Your pixels stop working for all iPhone traffic.

Half of all mobile traffic affected

üß®

Ad Blockers Hide Data

Nearly half of internet users install ad blockers. Your JavaScript pixels never fire. You lose visibility into half your traffic.

All websites, all industries

üçé

Safari Blocks All Tracking

Safari blocks third-party cookies entirely (not just "limits" them). Apple did this in 2017 to protect privacy. Your data is incomplete without a workaround.

28% of web traffic uses Safari

üèõÔ∏è

GDPR Consent Banners Block Tracking

European regulations require consent. Most people decline. Your tracking is reduced by 60-80%. Your data is incomplete.

EU businesses and global companies

The Result?

You're making decisions based on half the data

The Solution

We Capture Data Before It's Blocked

Your current tracking happens in the browser ‚Äî which gets blocked. We capture data from your server instead, so nothing can block it.

Without Server-Side Tracking

  • ‚úï 40% missing data from iOS users
  • ‚úï Inaccurate analytics ‚Äî decisions on bad data
  • ‚úï Wasted ad spend on campaigns that "look" good
  • ‚úï Can't optimize what you can't measure

With AdsEngineer SST

  • ‚úì 100% data recovery ‚Äî bypass all blocks
  • ‚úì Accurate attribution ‚Äî see what really works
  • ‚úì Better decisions ‚Äî optimize with confidence
  • ‚úì GDPR compliant ‚Äî first-party data only

FAQ

Common Questions

Will this work with my website?

Yes. Just add a small script to your site ‚Äî like Google Tag Manager. No backend changes needed. Works with WordPress, Shopify, Shopware, WooCommerce, Webflow, custom sites ‚Äî anything. For advanced setups, we also support full server-side integration.

Do I need to be technical to set this up?

No. For WordPress and Shopify, we have plugins ‚Äî just install and activate. For custom sites, it's one line of JavaScript. We handle the technical setup on our end.

Is this GDPR compliant?

Yes. We use first-party data collection. Data never leaves your infrastructure until you decide where to send it. EU data stays in EU. No third-party cookies required.

How long does setup take?

5 minutes for WordPress/Shopify. 30 minutes for custom implementations. Most businesses are tracking accurately within an hour of signing up.

What if I'm not losing data?

Run our free data loss audit. We'll show you exactly how much data you're missing. If you're not losing data, we'll tell you ‚Äî no charge.

What is server-side tracking?

Traditional tracking sends data from the user's browser to your analytics tools. Server-side tracking sends data from your website's server instead. This means ad blockers can't stop it, and it bypasses browser privacy restrictions.

What are first-party and third-party cookies?

First-party cookies are set by the website you're visiting. Third-party cookies are set by other websites (like Facebook or Google) to track you across the internet. Browsers block third-party cookies but allow first-party cookies.

What's iOS App Tracking Transparency?

A privacy feature Apple released in April 2021. Every iPhone app must ask you: "Allow this app to track your activity across other apps and websites?" 40% of users say "no" ‚Äî breaking your analytics for all iPhone traffic.

What is Safari ITP?

Intelligent Tracking Prevention is Safari's privacy feature that completely blocks third-party cookies. Safari does this to protect your privacy, but it breaks your marketing analytics unless you work around it.

What is GDPR?

General Data Protection Regulation. European law that requires businesses to get user consent before tracking. Most users decline the consent banner, reducing your data by 60-80%.
